speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but can you tell me what this is about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your past due balance with XYZ Credit Card. This is a debt collection call.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I've requested multiple times to be put on a do not call list.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. I will ensure your number is added to our do not call list right away.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you. I really don't want to receive these calls anymore.

speaker: Agent
text: Understood. Your number will be marked as do not call immediately.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! If you need anything else, feel free to reach out. Have a good day.
